description: This file contains a test case class 'PingTest' that performs ping operations to verify network connectivity to a target IP address. It uses subprocess to execute the ping command multiple times and checks for consecutive successful replies.

classes.name: PingTest
classes.description: A test case class inheriting from OERuntimeTestCase, performing a repeated ping test to a target IP address with a timeout constraint.

methods.name: test_ping(self)
methods.description: A test method decorated with OETimeout that executes ping commands up to 5 times to ensure network reachability, failing if not successful within the retries.
